name: W Boston

reviews.text: These guys don't leave anything to chance. The impeccable service coupled with modern luxury accommodations make the W Boston the place to stay when visiting bean town. I a Starwood platinum member from nyc with very high standards...rest assured this property meets all the requirements for the picky traveler. The staff will go out of their way to help you.
reviews.title: Amazing as always

reviews.text: Certainly one of Boston'c more chic properties, this W--like all of its sister properties around the world--oozes sophistication.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: Love the platinum amenity breakfast option (up to $50 restaurant credit for two people each day). That's generous and something I've never seen at a domestic W.
reviews.title: Don't get it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My room (on the top hotel floor) was clean, spacious and sexy. I really dislike hotels with shower/tub combos. As a fatigued business traveler, I so much look forward to a big walk-in shower with a high shower head. As always, I love the Bliss amenities. Can't get enough of that amazing scent.
reviews.title: Great location, wonderful service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service is strong. I appreciate the follow-through by Whatever/Whenever. Also appreciate the thoughtful gift I was provided (waiting in my room) upon check-in.
reviews.title: Love it

description: Our Boston Hotel makes its dramatic entrance into the fashionable and storied theatre district, an icon of contemporary sophistication. The W Boston Hotel looks forward to welcoming you.
